text: Gwendoline van Putten School (GvP) is the sole secondary and vocational school in St. Eustatius. It offers PrO, VMBO, HAVO (Senior General Secondary Education), and MBO courses.Home. Gwendoline van Putten School. Retrieved on February 28, 2018. ==References== ==External links== * Gwendoline van Putten School Category:Secondary schools in the Dutch Caribbean Category:Education in Sint Eustatius Category:Buildings and structures in Sint Eustatius
title: Gwendoline van Putten School
